films.title: The River
films.logline: After a painful breakup, a lost traveler pauses by a riverside where a guarded local woman seeking solitude shares an unexpected afternoon with him. Through quiet conversation and shared silence, two strangers confront grief, love, and the courage it takes to finally let go and move forward.

films.title: Chat Room
films.logline: Insomniac Ethan bonds with a woman online, then watches in horror as a masked intruder attacks her live on camera. As he desperately searches for clues to save her, he realizes he is being watched too, and the nightmare is only beginning.

films.title: Escape Room
films.logline: New to the city, Emily falls into a whirlwind friendship with a stranger who invites her into an exclusive underground scene. As the night unfolds, thrill shifts to dread, and she realizes she may be in far deeper than she ever expected.

films.title: Downfall
films.logline: A struggling writer slowly self-destructs through alcohol, failure, and regret, losing his career, relationship, and stability, before clawing his way back through sheer persistence and one final breakthrough.

films.title: Dark Forest
films.logline: A vlogger ventures into a forbidden forest to uncover the truth behind his brotherâ€™s disappearance.
